verses.verse: Now <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>with<s%> his <S%H113>master,<s%> and <S%H5375>honorable,<s%> because by him <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H8668>victory<s%> to <S%H758>Syria:<s%> he was also a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2428>valor,<s%> but he was a <S%H6879>leper.<s%>

The <S%H758>Syrians<s%> had gone <S%H3318>out<s%> in <S%H1416>bands,<s%> and had brought away <S%H7617>captive<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5291>maiden;<s%> and she waited <S%H6440>on<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to her <S%H1404>mistress,<s%> "I <S%H305>wish<s%> that my <S%H113>lord<s%> were <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> who is in <S%H8111>Samaria!<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> he would <S%H622>heal<s%> him of his <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>"
Someone went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> his <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H5291>maiden<s%> who is from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> said <S%H1696>this.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"Go<s%> <S%H3212>now,<s%> and I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H5612>letter<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>" He <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> with <S%H3027>him<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothing.<s%>

He <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H5612>letter<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Now when this <S%H5612>letter<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7971>you,<s%> behold, I have sent <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> to <S%H622>you,<s%> that you may heal him of his <S%H6883>leprosy.<s%>"

It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when the king of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7121>read<s%> the <S%H5612>letter,<s%> that he <S%H7167>tore<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Am I <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> and to make <S%H2421>alive,<s%> that this <S%H2088>man<s%> <S%H7971>sends<s%> to me to <S%H622>heal<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of his <S%H6883>leprosy?<s%> <S%H389>But<s%> please <S%H3045>consider<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> how he seeks a quarrel against <S%H579>me.<s%>"

It was <S%H477>so,<s%> when Elisha the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H7167>torn<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> that he <S%H7971>sent<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Why have you <S%H7167>torn<s%> your <S%H899>clothes?<s%> Let him <S%H935>come<s%> now to <S%H3045>me,<s%> and he shall know that there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

So <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> with his <S%H5483>horses<s%> and with his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha.<s%>

<S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H4397>messenger<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H7364>wash<s%> in the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall come <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H2891>you,<s%> and you shall be clean."

But <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> was <S%H7107>angry,<s%> and went <S%H3212>away,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H559>"Behold,<s%> I thought, <S%H3318><s%> 'He will surely come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H5975>me,<s%> and stand, and <S%H7121>call<s%> on the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5130>wave<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> over the <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H622>heal<s%> the <S%H6879>leper.<s%>'

<S%H71>Aren't<s%> Abanah and <S%H6554>Pharpar,<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than all the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H7364>Couldn't<s%> I wash in <S%H2891>them,<s%> and be clean?" So he <S%H6437>turned<s%> and went <S%H3212>away<s%> in a <S%H2534>rage.<s%>

His <S%H5650>servants<s%> came <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "My <S%H1>father,<s%> if the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> had <S%H1696>asked<s%> you do some <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1697>thing,<s%> <S%H6213>wouldn't<s%> you have done <S%H637>it?<s%> How much rather then, when he <S%H559>says<s%> to <S%H7364>you,<s%> 'Wash, and be <S%H2891>clean?<s%>'"

Then went he <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H2881>dipped<s%> himself <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> in the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%> and his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> was <S%H7725>restored<s%> like the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5288>child,<s%> and he was <S%H2891>clean.<s%>

He <S%H7725>returned<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> he and all his <S%H4264>company,<s%> and <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him;<s%> and he said, "See <S%H3045>now,<s%> I know that there is no <S%H430>God<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> but in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> Now <S%H3947>therefore,<s%> please take a <S%H1293>gift<s%> from your <S%H5650>servant.<s%>"

But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> whom I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> I will <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H6484>none.<s%>" He urged him to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3985>it;<s%> but he refused.

<S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "If <S%H6776>not,<s%> then, please let two <S%H6505>mules<s%>' <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H127>earth<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to your <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> will from now on <S%H6213>offer<s%> neither burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> nor <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> but to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

In this <S%H1697>thing<s%> may <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> your <S%H5650>servant:<s%> when my <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H935>goes<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H8172>there,<s%> and he leans on my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and I <S%H7812>bow<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon.<s%> When I <S%H7812>bow<s%> myself in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7417>Rimmon,<s%> may <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5545>pardon<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> in this <S%H1697>thing.<s%>"
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>" So he <S%H3212>departed<s%> from him a <S%H3530>little<s%> <S%H776>way.<s%>

But <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> the <S%H5288>servant<s%> of <S%H477>Elisha<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H113>"Behold,<s%> my master has <S%H2820>spared<s%> this <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> the <S%H761>Syrian,<s%> in not <S%H3947>receiving<s%> at his <S%H3027>hands<s%> that which he <S%H935>brought.<s%> As <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I will <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3947>him,<s%> and take something from <S%H3972>him.<s%>"

So <S%H1522>Gehazi<s%> <S%H7291>followed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5283>Naaman.<s%> When <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> one <S%H7323>running<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5307>him,<s%> he came down from the <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> and said, "Is all <S%H7965>well?<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> "All is <S%H7965>well.<s%> My <S%H113>master<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H559>me,<s%> saying, <S%H8147><s%> 'Behold, even now two <S%H5288>young<s%> men of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to me from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> country of <S%H669>Ephraim.<s%> Please <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothing.<s%>'"

<S%H5283>Naaman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Be <S%H2974>pleased<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> two <S%H3603>talents.<s%>" He <S%H6555>urged<s%> <S%H6696>him,<s%> and bound <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2754>bags,<s%> with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H899>clothing,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> them on <S%H8147>two<s%> of his <S%H5288>servants;<s%> and they <S%H5375>carried<s%> them before <S%H6440>him.<s%>

When he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6076>hill,<s%> he <S%H3947>took<s%> them from their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H6485>stored<s%> them in the <S%H1004>house.<s%> Then he let the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> and they <S%H3212>departed.<s%>

But he went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> before his <S%H113>master.<s%> <S%H477>Elisha<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H370>him,<s%> "Where did you come <S%H1522>from,<s%> Gehazi?" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H575>nowhere.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3820>him,<s%> "Didn't my heart <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H376>you,<s%> when the man <S%H2015>turned<s%> from his <S%H4818>chariot<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H6256>you?<s%> Is it a time to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H3701>money,<s%> and to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H2132>olive<s%> groves and <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>cattle,<s%> and male <S%H5650>servants<s%> and female <S%H8198>servants?<s%>

Therefore the <S%H6883>leprosy<s%> of <S%H5283>Naaman<s%> will <S%H1692>cling<s%> to you and to your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>" He went <S%H3318>out<s%> from his <S%H6440>presence<s%> a <S%H6879>leper,<s%> as white as <S%H7950>snow.<s%>
